abstract: 1964 NFL championship ring stolen from former Cleveland Browns Hall of Fame running back Jim Brown will be returned to him by memorabilia dealer after lawsuit Brown brought against dealer settles; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame running back Jim Brown has settled a lawsuit he had brought against a memorabilia dealer and will be reunited with the 1964 N.F.L. championship ring he won with the Cleveland Browns.
snippet: The Hall of Fame running back Jim Brown has settled a lawsuit he had brought against a memorabilia dealer and will be reunited with the 1964 N.F.L. championship ring he won with the Cleveland Browns.
